noun.description: United States regional. A North American freshwater mussel, Lasmigona complanata, with rough ridges on the shell. Now rare.

Chiefly US (originally regional). The shovelnose sturgeon, Scaphirhynchus platorynchus, a small freshwater sturgeon of the Missouri and Mississippi river systems. Often attributive, especially with reference to the use of its black roe as caviar.
